title: Recipe for Tea
text: Boil water with tea leaves. Add milk and sugar. Strain it to have good tea!!

title: Deploy to Heroku
text: Expect SSH issue, to address it update the SSH config to add heroku.com host name with PORT 22

title: Ways to be Happy
text: Being Happy lies in your head. Everything has 2 perpectives positive and not-so positive. Focus on positive.

title: Good Movies to Watch
text:

title: Good Colors for Eyes
text: Definitely no specific colors are good for eyes. But certainly some colors are sift on eyes like green, dark blue,  ocean, turquoise!!
